entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, and amounts may approach warning criteria. The rain should ease in the north of the area around midnight, but later further south. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain and accumulations may approach warning criteria, especially about the ranges. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.
